title: Korporus marketing website parity with kanb.us
description: Implement apps/korpor.us by mirroring apps/kanb.us architecture and styling, replacing all content/docs for Korporus, adding frame-parameterized pictogram compatibility for VideoML, and wiring Amplify Gen2 deployment with video CDN outputs.

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text: Epic completed: Korporus marketing/docs website parity implementation landed with copied architecture, Korporus content/docs overhaul, frame-compatible pictogram, and Amplify Gen2 deployment wiring.
